metadata.title: CVE-2020-13325 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions prior 13.1. The commentsection of the issue page was not restricting the characters properly,potentially resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
